name: The Bird's Realm 3
description:
This is simple calm open world bird flying simulator that I originally created for the mobile platform! There are no goals or quests, just find glowing eggs in the map to unlock birds. Finding an egg will unlock a bird and a new egg will appear in the map. Simply flying around this much larger island (than the mobile version) in a sandbox open world to kill time.

Controls: [W][S][A][D] keys for Forwards/Backwards and turning Right/Left. [↑][↓] keys for Up/Down. [1][2][3] to look Right/Left/Down.

Birds unlocked at the beginning:
*Red-tailed Hawk
*Golden Eagle

Birds to unlock:
*Zone-tailed Hawk
*Coopers Hawk
*Black Hawk-Eagle
*Bald Eagle
*Scarlet Macaw
*Hyacinth Macaw
*Great Green Macaw
*Toco Toucan
*Channel-Billed Toucan
*Keel-Billed Toucan
*Mute Swan
*Black Swan
*Black-Necked Swan
*Wild Turkey
*Ocellated Turkey
*Australian Brush Turkey
*Whooping Crane
*Sandhill Crane
*Red-Crowned Crane
*American White Ibis
*Glossy Ibis
*Scarlet Ibis
*Greater Flamingo
*Hoatzin
*Parakeet Blue & Green
*Wrinkled Hornbill
*Palawan Hornbill
*Walden's Hornbill
*Racket Tail Treepie
*Secretarybird
*Shoebill
